title: LailaMajnu
description: The story revolves around two young lovers, Laila and Qais (Majnu), whose families oppose their relationship, leading to a passionate but ultimately doomed romance.

title: Rokstar
description: Rockstar is a 2011 Hindi romantic drama film about Janardhan Jakhar, a young man who aspires to be a rockstar and believes that pain and suffering are essential for musical creativity.

title: Andaaz apna apna
description: Andaz Apna Apna is a 1994 Indian Hindi-language comedy film about two aimless young men, Amar and Prem, who both try to marry a wealthy heiress, Raveena, to get rich quick.

title: Heeramandi
description: a historical red-light district in Lahore, Pakistan, known for its grand brothels and the musical performances of courtesans.

title: Avtar
description: A science fiction film set in the 22nd century on Pandora, a lush moon of a gas giant.

title: Avengers
description: A team of superheroes from Marvel Comics, primarily featured in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU).

title: Wednesday
description: Journey of Wednesday Addams, Tasked with mastering her psychic abilities, she confronts a series of town murders and a haunting family mystery from 25 years ago, all while managing new social dynamics.

title: Stranger Things
description: Stranger Things is a sci-fi horror web series set in the 1980s in the fictional town of Hawkins, Indiana, It follows a group of kids who uncover a secret government experiment that has opened a portal to a dangerous parallel dimension called the Upside Down.

title: Aarya
description: Aarya is an Indian crime thriller web series created by Ram Madhvani, mother whose life turns upside down when her husband, involved in an illegal drug business, is mysteriously killed.

title: The Vampire Diaries
description: The Vampire Diaries is a supernatural drama series set in the fictional town of Mystic Falls, revolving around the lives, loves, dangers, and disasters of its residents—many of whom are vampires, witches, and werewolves.

title: Money Heist
description: Money Heist is a Spanish heist crime drama that follows a mysterious mastermind known as The Professor, who recruits eight skilled criminals to carry out two ambitious heists — one on the Royal Mint of Spain and another on the Bank of Spain.

title: Mismatched
description: Mismatched, coming-of-age romantic drama about two young people from very different worlds who meet at a summer tech course, navigating friendship, love, and personal ambitions.

title: Squid Game
description: Squid Game is a South Korean survival thriller series where hundreds of financially struggling contestants compete in deadly versions of children’s games for a massive cash prize.

title: The Good Doctor
description: A heartfelt medical drama about an autistic surgical resident with savant syndrome overcoming prejudice to showcase his medical brilliance..

title: Sweet Home
description: A South Korean apocalyptic horror series where residents of an apartment complex fight to survive as people across the world mysteriously turn into monsters driven by their innermost desires..

title: Ashiqui
description: musical romance film released in 2013, starring Aditya Roy Kapur and Shraddha Kapoor. The movie tells the story of Rahul, a successful but alcoholic singer, who mentors and falls in love with Arohi, a small-town singer, and helps her rise to fame.

title: Anand
description: Explores themes of life, death, friendship, and the importance of living life to the fullest, even in the face of adversity.

title: AgneePath
description: Agneepath is a story of revenge, centered around Vijay Chauhan, whose father is lynched by a gangster, Kancha Cheena, after being framed

title: Badlapur
description: Badlapur is a Hindi crime thriller where Raghu (Varun Dhawan), a man whose wife and son are killed during a bank robbery, seeks revenge against the perpetrators

title: Bhool Bhulaiya
description: Bhool Bhulaiyaa is a Indian Hindi-language psychological horror comedy film about a couple who move into their ancestral home, ignoring warnings that it is haunted

title: Bahubali
description: tells the story of Shivudu, a man raised in a tribal village who discovers his past and destiny as he embarks on a journey to rescue Devasena from the tyrannical King Bhallaladeva

title: Barfi
description: a 2012 Indian romantic comedy-drama film following the story of Barfi, a deaf and mute man, and his relationships with two women, Shruti and Jhilmil.

title: Bajrangi BhaiJaan
description: Bajrangi Bhaijaan will count as Salman Khan''s best movie. Magnum opus in every way..it is a simple movie with an extraordinary script. A movie about an Indian who helps a Pakistani girl to go back to her country so she can be reunited with her parents. It teaches us that humanity is far above religion.

title: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher, Walter White, turns to manufacturing methamphetamine after a terminal cancer diagnosis, teaming up with former student Jesse Pinkman. The series explores morality, crime, and transformation.

title: Game of Thrones
description: An epic fantasy drama based on George R.R. Martin’s A Song of Ice and Fire novels, following the power struggles among noble families for control of the Iron Throne in the Seven Kingdoms of Westeros.

title: Mirzapur
description: An Indian crime thriller web series set in the lawless city of Mirzapur, Uttar Pradesh, revolving around power, politics, crime, and the mafia underworld. It follows the rise of local dons and the impact of violence on families.

title: The Boys
description: A dark, satirical superhero series where a group of vigilantes takes on corrupt, power-abusing superheroes backed by a powerful corporation. Known for its gritty violence, dark humor, and political commentary.

title: Daredevil
description: A gritty Marvel superhero series following blind lawyer Matt Murdock, who uses his heightened senses to fight crime as Daredevil in Hell’s Kitchen, New York.

title: The Wire
description: The show explores the city of Baltimore through the perspectives of law enforcement, drug dealers, politicians, journalists, and citizens, offering a gritty and realistic portrayal of urban life.

title: Mad Men
description: A critically acclaimed drama set in 1960s New York, following the lives of advertising executives at Sterling Cooper, exploring themes of ambition, identity, and societal change.

title: Fleabag
description: A dark comedy-drama following a witty but emotionally troubled woman navigating love, loss, family, and self-destruction while frequently breaking the fourth wall to speak directly to the audience.

title: The Leftovers
description: A mysterious and emotional drama following the lives of people left behind after 2% of the world’s population inexplicably vanishes, exploring grief, faith, and the search for meaning.

title: The Americans
description: An American period spy thriller television series set during the Cold War, following two Soviet KGB officers posing as a married couple in suburban Washington, D.C., while secretly conducting espionage.

title: The Office (UK)
description: A mockumentary-style sitcom following the mundane yet hilariously awkward daily operations at the Wernham Hogg paper company, led by the cringeworthy and self-absorbed manager David Brent.

title: Succession
description: A satirical drama about the wealthy, dysfunctional Roy family, owners of a global media empire, who engage in power struggles as the patriarch’s health declines.

title: Tabbar
description: Tabbar is a 2021 Indian Punjabi-language crime thriller drama web series about a middle-class retired policeman whose family becomes entangled in a web of lies, violence, and moral dilemmas after an unexpected crime disrupts their peaceful life.

title: Maharani
description: The story begins when Chief Minister Bheema Bharti survives an assassination attempt and, in a power play, appoints his homemaker wife, Rani Bharti (Huma Qureshi), as his successor.

title: Rudra: The Edge of Darkness
description: It follows DCP Rudraveer Pratap Singh (Rudra), a brilliant detective in Mumbai's Special Crimes Unit, as he dives into the minds of highly intelligent—and often disturbed—criminals.

title: Bard of Blood
description: An Indian spy thriller where former RAW agent Kabir Anand is pulled back into the world of espionage to rescue Indian agents captured in Balochistan, uncovering dangerous political conspiracies along the way.

title: Guilty Minds
description: Guilty Minds is an Indian legal drama web series that follows two close friends and lawyers — one who fights for idealistic causes and the other who works for a high-profile law firm — as they handle complex legal cases and navigate personal conflicts.

title: The Great Indian Murder
description: A Hindi-language crime mystery thriller following an investigating officer and a CBI officer as they unravel the complex murder of an industrialist, exposing hidden motives, political conspiracies, and buried secrets.

title: Masaba Masaba
description: Masaba navigating post-divorce dilemmas, career challenges, and societal scrutiny, while Neena offers wisdom and balance from her own acting journey.

title: Mumbai Diaries
description: The first season centers around the doctors, nurses, and first responders at Bombay General Hospital as they grapple with the harrowing night of the 2008 Mumbai terror attacks.

title: Sacred Games
description: A gritty Indian crime thriller where a Mumbai police officer, Sartaj Singh, receives a mysterious tip from gangster Ganesh Gaitonde, leading him into a dark web of political corruption, underworld crime, and a looming threat to the city.

title: Yeh Meri Family
description: A heartwarming Indian web series set in the 1990s, following 12-year-old Harshu Gupta as he navigates school, friendships, family drama, and the ups and downs of growing up in a middle-class household. The show blends nostalgia with humor and emotional moments.

title: Made in Heaven
description: Made in Heaven is an Indian drama web series that follows two wedding planners in Delhi as they navigate the complexities of lavish Indian weddings, while dealing with personal struggles, social issues, and moral dilemmas.

title: Little Things
description: An Indian romantic drama web series that follows the everyday life of a young couple, Dhruv and Kavya, exploring love, relationships, and personal growth through small, relatable moments.

title: Delhi Crime
description: A gripping Indian crime drama series based on real-life investigations by the Delhi Police, particularly inspired by the 2012 Delhi gang rape case in Season 1. It portrays the intense challenges and emotional toll faced by the officers handling such brutal crimes.

title: Criminal Justice
description: Made in Heaven is an Indian drama web series that follows two wedding planners in Delhi as they navigate the complexities of lavish Indian weddings, while dealing with personal struggles, social issues, and moral dilemmas.

title: Kota Factory
description: The storyline centers on Vaibhav, a 16–17-year-old who relocates from Itarsi to Kota, Rajasthan—India’s famous coaching hub.

title: Inside Edge
description: Inside Edge is an Indian sports-drama web series that blends cricket, politics, and entertainment, showing the dark underbelly of a fictional T20 cricket league, including match-fixing, power struggles, and behind-the-scenes drama.

title: Paatal Lok
description: A gritty Indian crime thriller where a disillusioned Delhi cop gets assigned a high-profile case involving the attempted murder of a journalist, uncovering dark secrets of politics, crime, and society along the way.

title: Panchayat
description: The story of Abhishek Tripathi, an engineering graduate who reluctantly takes up a job as a secretary in a remote village panchayat office due to lack of better job opportunities.

title: Special OPS
description: The story follows Himmat Singh, a RAW officer, who believes that a single terrorist mastermind is behind several major attacks in India over the past two decades.

title: Family Man
description: A middle-class man secretly working as an intelligence officer for the National Investigation Agency (NIA). The story balances his dangerous missions with the challenges of managing his family life.

title: Scam 1992
description: A gripping Indian Hindi-language biographical financial thriller, Scam 1992 dramatizes the meteoric rise and dramatic fall of stockbroker Harshad Mehta during the early 1990s.

title: Rocket Boys
description: Rocket Boys is an Indian biographical drama web series that tells the story of two visionary scientists, Dr. Homi J. Bhabha and Dr. Vikram Sarabhai.

title: Class
description: It follows three students from poor backgrounds who join a prestigious elite school in Delhi on scholarship. Their clash with wealthy classmates leads to friendships, rivalries, forbidden relationships, and eventually a shocking crime that exposes deep social divides.

title: ICarly
description: The series shows their fun adventures, creative skits, and the ups and downs of teenage life, often mixed with quirky humor from Carly’s older brother Spencer.

title: Breath
description: The story follows survivors struggling to endure in a devastated world, facing dangers not only from the environment but also from desperate human conflicts.

title: Andhadhun
description: A blind pianist who becomes entangled in a series of mysterious events after witnessing a murder. The film blends suspense, humor, and unexpected twists.

title: Article 15
description: A hard-hitting Bollywood crime drama inspired by true events, where a young IPS officer (played by Ayushmann Khurrana) investigates caste-based discrimination and atrocities in rural India, exposing deep-rooted social injustices.

title: Ae Dil Hai Mushkil
description: The film explores the complexities of love, friendship, and heartbreak. It follows the story of Ayan (Ranbir Kapoor), Alizeh (Anushka Sharma), and Saba (Aishwarya Rai Bachchan), as they navigate unrequited love, deep bonds, and emotional struggles.

title: Airlift
description: It follows Ranjit Katyal (played by Akshay Kumar), a wealthy Indian businessman in Kuwait, who leads the massive evacuation of Indians during the 1990 Iraq–Kuwait war, making it the largest civil evacuation in history.

title: Aashiqui 2
description: It tells the story of Rahul, a successful but troubled singer battling alcoholism, who falls in love with Aarohi, a small-town girl with a melodious voice. Rahul helps her achieve her dreams of becoming a singing star, but his own self-destructive habits threaten their love.

title: Band Baaja Baaraat
description: Shruti and Bittoo, who start a wedding planning business in Delhi. Their professional partnership faces challenges when love complicates their friendship and work.

title: Bhoot
description: Bollywood horror thriller film where a shipping officer (played by Vicky Kaushal) investigates a mysterious abandoned ship Sea Bird, that suddenly appears on the Mumbai coast. As he explores, he encounters terrifying supernatural occurrences linked to the ships dark past.

title: Chak De! India
description: Chak De! India is a Bollywood sports drama film about Kabir Khan, a former hockey player who redeems his tarnished reputation by coaching the Indian women’s hockey team.

title: Chhichhore
description: Chhichhore is a heartwarming Bollywood dramedy about a group of college friends who reunite years later after a tragic incident. Through flashbacks, it highlights the carefree hostel life, deep friendships, love, and the message that failure is not the end of life.

title: Cocktail
description: Cocktail is a romantic comedy-drama about love, friendship, and complicated relationships. The story follows Gautam, Meera, and Veronica, three friends with very different personalities, whose lives take unexpected turns when love and emotions blur the lines of friendship.

title: Chennai Express
description: The story follows a man who boards the wrong train while heading to Rameswaram and ends up on an unexpected adventure through South India. Along the way, he meets a woman trying to escape from her powerful father, leading to a journey filled with comedy, action, and romance.

title: Commando
description: A One Man Army is an Indian action thriller film that follows Karanveer Dogra, a highly trained commando, who escapes from captivity and takes on a corrupt politician’s men to protect a young woman fighting against injustice.

title: Coolie No. 1
description: A modern remake of the 1995 classic, directed again by David Dhawan, starring Varun Dhawan and Sara Ali Khan. The story remains similar with a comic take on mistaken identities and love.

title: Dangal
description: Dangal is a biographical sports drama based on the real-life story of wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his daughters Geeta Phogat and Babita Kumari, who went on to win medals for India in international wrestling competitions.

title: Devdas
description: The story follows Devdas Mukherjee, a wealthy young man who returns from London and rekindles his childhood love for Paro (Parvati). However, societal pressures and misunderstandings separate them, leading Devdas into a spiral of heartbreak, self-destruction, and alcoholism.

title: Dhamaal
description: Dhamaal is a Bollywood comedy film directed by Indra Kumar. The story follows four lazy and jobless friends who accidentally learn about a hidden treasure. Their hilarious and chaotic journey to find the treasure leads to endless misadventures, slapstick humor, and laugh-out-loud moments.

title: Ek Villain
description: A romantic action thriller where a gangster with a tragic past falls in love with a free-spirited girl, but their love story takes a dark turn when a serial killer enters their lives.

title: Entertainment
description: Entertainment is a Bollywood comedy film starring Akshay Kumar and Tamannaah Bhatia. The story follows a man named Akhil who learns that his billionaire father has left his entire fortune to a dog named Entertainment.

title: Fanaa
description: Fanaa is a 2006 Bollywood romantic thriller about Zooni, a visually impaired Kashmiri girl who falls in love with a charming tour guide, Rehan. Their love story takes a dark turn when shocking secrets about Rehan’s true identity are revealed, blending romance with themes of sacrifice, betrayal, and patriotism.

title: Fan
description: It follows the story of Gaurav, a young man obsessed with superstar Aryan Khanna, both played by Shah Rukh Khan. When admiration turns into obsession, Gaurav’s fandom spirals into dangerous rivalry, leading to a tense battle between star and admirer.

title: Fitoor
description: Fitoor is a Bollywood romantic drama directed by Abhishek Kapoor, inspired by Charles Dickens' novel Great Expectations. It follows the story of Noor, a poor Kashmiri boy who falls deeply in love with Firdaus, the daughter of a wealthy woman, leading to a tale of passion, heartbreak, and unfulfilled love set against the backdrop of Kashmir.

title: Chhaava
description: It tells the story of Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj, the valiant second ruler of the Maratha Empire, who leads the resistance against the Mughal ruler Aurangzeb. Adapted from Shivaji Sawant’s Marathi novel Chhava, the film portrays his bravery, strategy, betrayal, and unwavering spirit.

title: Gully Boy
description: Gully Boy is a coming-of-age musical drama inspired by the lives of Indian street rappers Divine and Naezy. It follows Murad, a young man from the slums of Mumbai, who rises against social and economic odds to chase his dream of becoming a rap artist.

title: Golmaal
description: The story follows four friends—Gopal, Lucky, Madhav, and Laxman—who get caught up in a series of hilarious misunderstandings while trying to con their way into a blind couple’s house.

title: Hichki
description: Hichki is a Bollywood drama film starring Rani Mukerji as Naina Mathur, an aspiring teacher who has Tourette Syndrome. Despite facing rejection and societal prejudice, she lands a teaching job at an elite school and takes on the challenge of educating a group of underprivileged students, proving her determination and resilience.

title: Gangubai Kathiawadi
description: The film stars Alia Bhatt as Gangubai, a young woman forced into prostitution who rises to become a powerful figure in Mumbai’s Kamathipura red-light district. It portrays her struggles, fight for women’s rights, and influence in the underworld.

title: Highway
description: Highway is a 2014 Indian road drama film directed by Imtiaz Ali. It follows the story of a young woman, Veera, who is abducted just before her wedding but gradually develops a complex bond with her kidnapper during their journey across India. The film explores themes of freedom, trauma, and self-discovery.

title: Saiyaara
description: It follows Krish Kapoor, a troubled musician, who discovers and transforms the diary lyrics of Vaani Batra — a shy poet — into soulful songs, sparking a profound romantic connection between them. Their love is tested when Vaani is diagnosed with early-onset Alzheimer’s. The story navigates themes of memory, love, loss, and resilience.
